fields.name: textColor
fields.label: Text Color
fields.description: Choose a color for the text

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.label: Hover Text Color
fields.description: Choose a color for the text inside the buttons when hovered, normally black or white

fields.name: backgroundColor1
fields.label: Background Color 1
fields.description: Choose a color for the background (this is the primary section color starting from the hero section)

fields.name: backgroundColor2
fields.label: Background Color 2
fields.description: Choose a color for the background (this is the secondary section color starting from the research section)

fields.name: backgroundColor3
fields.label: Background Color 3
fields.description: Choose a color for the background (this is the tertiary section color used for the links in the research section)

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.label: Highlight Color
fields.description: Choose a color for the highlight (this is the color used for some buttons)

fields.name: unactivatedColor
fields.label: Inactivate Button Color
fields.description: Choose a color for inactivate buttons (this is the color used for the download button when there is no file)

fields.name: highlightTextColor
fields.label: Highlight Text Color
fields.description: Choose a color for the text inside the buttons colored with the highlight color

fields.name: unactivatedHighlightTextColor
fields.label: Inactivate Highlight Text Color
fields.description: Choose a color for the text inside the inactive buttons colored with the highlight color

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
